83577.summary: Some customers in the Otter District area of Langley are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
83577.title: Oct 4 - Langley (Otter District) | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)

83575.title: Oct 4 - Edmonton (Ormsby Place) | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)
